local Tool = script.Parent local Character = nil local debounceHumHits = {} local debounceHumTimes = {} local damage = 35
local GLib = require(206209239)
local function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[child] end
local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, "Handle") local Mesh = WaitForChild(Handle, "Mesh") local GlowSpeed = WaitForChild(Tool, "GlowSpeed") local SwingValue = WaitForChild(Tool, "SwingValue")
function onHit(hit) if not hit then return end local hitChar = hit.Parent if not hitChar or hitChar == Character then return end
local hitHum = hitChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not hitHum then return end
if not Character or not Character == Tool.Parent then return end -- not in hand if not Tool.Enabled then return end -- don't hurt if not swingin'
-- debounce check, and then do the damage! local currTime = tick() if (not debounceHumHits[hitHum] or debounceHumHits[hitHum] ~= SwingValue.Value or currTime - debounceHumTimes[hitHum] > 2) and GLib.IsTeammate(GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(hit), GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(Tool))~=true then debounceHumTimes[hitHum] = currTime debounceHumHits[hitHum] = SwingValue.Value hitHum:TakeDamage(damage) end end
function onEquip() Character = Tool.Parent end
function onUnequip() Character = nil end
function glow() local glowParam = 0 local glowDirection = 1 while true do Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1+glowParam, 1+glowParam, 1+glowParam) glowParam = glowParam + glowDirection*GlowSpeed.Value if glowParam >= 1 then glowDirection = -1 end if glowParam <= 0 then glowDirection = 1 end
wait(.1) -- 10 frames a second is fine end end
-- make it glow coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(glow))
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip) Handle.Touched:connect(onHit)

local AnimationNames = {"Slash", "SlashAnim", "DarkenAnim", "ChargeAnim"} local Tool = script.Parent local Character = nil local Humanoid = nil local Torso = nil local Animations = {}
local function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[child] end
local GlowSpeed = WaitForChild(Tool, "GlowSpeed") local SwingValue = WaitForChild(Tool, "SwingValue") local Handle = WaitForChild(Tool, "Handle") local FireMesh = WaitForChild(Tool, "FireMesh")
local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.Name = "LeapForce" BodyVelocity.P = 100000 BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P, BodyVelocity.P) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
local ForceField = Instance.new("Part") ForceField.formFactor = "Custom" ForceField.Size = Vector3.new(0.1, 0.1, 0.1) ForceField.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Deep blue") ForceField.Transparency = .65 FireMesh:Clone().Parent = ForceField
local moreFields = ForceField:Clone() moreFields.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Navy blue") -- "Really blue" and "Bright bluish green" moreFields.Transparency = .65
local fieldsWeld = Instance.new("ManualWeld") fieldsWeld.Part0 = ForceField fieldsWeld.Part1 = moreFields fieldsWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() fieldsWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/4, 0)
local moreFields2 = ForceField:Clone() moreFields2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really blue") -- "Really blue" and "Bright bluish green" moreFields2.Transparency = .65
local fieldsWeld2 = Instance.new("ManualWeld") fieldsWeld2.Part0 = ForceField fieldsWeld2.Part1 = moreFields2 fieldsWeld2.C0 = CFrame.new() fieldsWeld2.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0)
local moreFields3 = ForceField:Clone() moreFields3.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright bluish green") -- "Really blue" and "Bright bluish green" moreFields3.Transparency = .65
local fieldsWeld3 = Instance.new("ManualWeld") fieldsWeld3.Part0 = ForceField fieldsWeld3.Part1 = moreFields3 fieldsWeld3.C0 = CFrame.new() fieldsWeld3.C1 = CFrame.Angles(0, 3*math.pi/4, 0)
moreFields.Parent = ForceField fieldsWeld.Parent = moreFields moreFields2.Parent = ForceField fieldsWeld2.Parent = moreFields2 moreFields3.Parent = ForceField fieldsWeld3.Parent = moreFields3
local ForceFieldWeld = Instance.new("ManualWeld") ForceFieldWeld.Part0 = Handle ForceFieldWeld.Part1 = ForceField ForceFieldWeld.C0 = CFrame.new() ForceFieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)) ForceFieldWeld.Parent = ForceField
local Mouse = nil
local lastMouseDownTime = 0 local lastMouseUpTime = 0
function onMouseDown() lastMouseDownTime = tick() end
function onMouseUp() lastMouseUpTime = tick() end
function onEquip() Character = Tool.Parent Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if Torso then Torso.Anchored = false end Handle.CanCollide = true
Animations = {}
lastMouseUpTime = lastMouseDownTime GlowSpeed.Value = .05 ForceField.Parent = nil
if mouse then Mouse = mouse mouseDownConn = Mouse.Button1Down:connect(onMouseDown) mouseUpConn = Mouse.Button1Up:connect(onMouseUp) end
if Character then Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid then for i = 1, #AnimationNames do local animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool[AnimationNames[i]]) table.insert(Animations, animation) end end end end
local mousehit = Vector3.new() script.Parent.Click.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, down, hit) if client.Character == script.Parent.Parent then mousehit = hit; (down and onMouseDown or onMouseUp)() end end)
local whichAnim = 1 local debounce = false local speed = .5
function adjustWalkspeed() if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 + (speed - .5)*5 end end
local lastSwing = 0 function onActivated() if #Animations < 1 or debounce then return end debounce = true Tool.Enabled = true
-- count swings for debouncing purposes if SwingValue.Value > 100 then SwingValue.Value = 0 else SwingValue.Value = SwingValue.Value + 1 end
-- increase speed as they spam clicks local currTime = tick() local dTime = currTime - lastSwing if dTime < 1.75*(1/speed) then if speed < 2.5 then speed = speed + .15 end else if speed < .5 then speed = .5 end end adjustWalkspeed() lastSwing = currTime
print("Playing: ", AnimationNames[whichAnim]) Animations[whichAnim]:Play(.1, 1, speed) whichAnim = whichAnim + 1 if whichAnim > 2 then whichAnim = 1 end -- left, right, left, right
wait(1/speed) Tool.Enabled = false debounce = false end
function onUnequip() if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Handle.CanCollide = true lastMouseUpTime = lastMouseDownTime
GlowSpeed.Value = .05 ForceField.Parent = nil
if Torso then Torso.Anchored = false end Torso = nil Character = nil Humanoid = nil Mouse = nil if mouseDownConn then mouseDownConn:disconnect() mouseDownConn = nil end if mouseUpConn then mouseUpConn:disconnect() mouseUpConn = nil end
for i = 1, #Animations do Animations[i]:Stop() end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquip) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)
local LEAP_THRUST = 600 * 4 local LEAP_TIME = 4 function calculateVelocity(percent, dirVector) local thrustVelocity = (.5 - percent) * (.5 - percent) * LEAP_THRUST if percent < .5 then return Vector3.new(dirVector.X, thrustVelocity, dirVector.Z) else return Vector3.new(dirVector.X, -thrustVelocity, dirVector.Z) end end
function rotateFires() ForceFieldWeld.C1 = ForceFieldWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, .1, 0) fieldsWeld.C1 = fieldsWeld.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, .1, 0) fieldsWeld2.C1 = fieldsWeld2.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, .05, 0) fieldsWeld3.C1 = fieldsWeld3.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, .075, 0) end
function LeapAt(targetPoint) local currTorso = Torso -- to avoid race conditions if not currTorso then return end local dirVector = targetPoint - currTorso.CFrame.p if dirVector.magnitude > 500 then return end -- too far; didn't leap
currTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(currTorso.CFrame.p, currTorso.CFrame.p + dirVector.unit)
BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = currTorso
delay(LEAP_TIME/4, function() Tool.GripUp = -1*Tool.GripUp Handle.CanCollide = true end)
local newForceField delay(LEAP_TIME*3/4, function() newForceField = Instance.new("ForceField") newForceField.Parent = Character end)
local startTime = tick() while tick() - startTime < LEAP_TIME-.1 do BodyVelocity.velocity = calculateVelocity((tick() - startTime)/LEAP_TIME, dirVector*(1/LEAP_TIME)) rotateFires() wait(.01) end BodyVelocity.Parent = nil currTorso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) -- don't fly through ground
local newExplosion = Instance.new("Explosion") newExplosion.Position = currTorso.CFrame.p newExplosion.BlastRadius = 20 newExplosion.BlastPressure = 1000000 newExplosion.Parent = workspace
wait(.75) if newForceField then newForceField.Parent = nil end end
function darkenFlames() ForceField.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Deep blue") moreFields.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Navy blue") moreFields2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really blue") moreFields3.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright bluish green") end
function lightenFlames() ForceField.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Toothpaste") moreFields.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Teal") moreFields2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel blue-green") moreFields3.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright bluish green") end
-- decrease speed constantly over time; also check mouse hold activity local debounceCharge = false local fullyCharged = false while true do local currTime = tick() if (lastMouseDownTime > lastMouseUpTime) and currTime > lastMouseDownTime + 2 then if not debounceCharge then debounceCharge = true -- play charge animation, if we've got it if Animations[3] then Animations[3]:Play(.1, 1, .1) end end if Torso and workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Torso.CFrame.p, Vector3.new(0, -3, 0)), Character) then Torso.Anchored = true end if Humanoid then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 end
GlowSpeed.Value = GlowSpeed.Value + .004
ForceField.FireMesh.Scale = GlowSpeed.Value/.5 * Vector3.new(1.2, 3.5, 1.2) moreFields.FireMesh.Scale = GlowSpeed.Value/.5 * Vector3.new(1.2, 3.5, 1.2) moreFields2.FireMesh.Scale = GlowSpeed.Value/.5 * Vector3.new(1.2, 3.5, 1.2) moreFields3.FireMesh.Scale = GlowSpeed.Value/.5 * Vector3.new(1.2, 3.5, 1.2)
ForceField.Parent = Character ForceFieldWeld.Parent = ForceField fieldsWeld.Parent = moreFields fieldsWeld2.Parent = moreFields2 fieldsWeld3.Parent = moreFields3 ForceFieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 2-GlowSpeed.Value/.5*4, 0)) rotateFires()
if GlowSpeed.Value >= .5 then GlowSpeed.Value = .5
lightenFlames()
if not fullyCharged then if Animations[3] then Animations[3]:Stop() end end fullyCharged = true end else if Torso then Torso.Anchored = false end
if fullyCharged and Humanoid then Handle.CanCollide = false if Animations[4] then Animations[4]:Play(.1, 1, 1) end LeapAt(mousehit) Tool.GripUp = -1*Tool.GripUp end fullyCharged = false
if debounceCharge then darkenFlames() end
debounceCharge = false if Animations[3] then Animations[3]:Stop() end if Animations[4] then Animations[4]:Stop() end
GlowSpeed.Value = .05
ForceField.Parent = nil
if speed > .5 and not debounce then speed = speed - .02 end adjustWalkspeed() end if not fullyCharged then wait(.1) else wait(.01) end end

script.Parent.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() script.Parent.Click:FireServer(true, mouse.Hit.p) end) mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() script.Parent.Click:FireServer(false, mouse.Hit.p) end) end)
